name: tipping-near-dapplet
description: Tipping Dapplet, allowing you to send money to another person on Twitter

scripts.postinstall: concurrently -c magenta,cyan -n dapplet,overlay "npm run install:dapplet" "npm run install:overlay"
scripts.start: concurrently -c magenta,cyan -n dapplet,overlay "npm run start:dapplet" "npm run start:overlay"

author: Dapplets Project
